SELECT m.mrch_id, m.mrch_id as validate_id , m.account, m.password, m.description, m.type, m.locked, m.state, m.is_deleted, m.create_manager_id, m.create_time, m.update_time, m.version_num, (select version_name from weiit_init_version where version_num=m.version_num) as version_name, m.version_begin_time, m.version_expire_time, sh.shop_id, sh.shop_name, ce.name as auth_name, ce.auth_no, ce.state as c_state, ( select manager_name from system_manager where manager_id=m.create_manager_id) as create_manager_name, ( select manager_name from system_manager where manager_id=m.update_manager_id) as update_manager_name FROM weiit_merchant m left join weiit_shop sh on m.mrch_id=sh.mrch_id left join weiit_shop_certification ce on sh.shop_id=ce.shop_id where m.is_deleted=0
and m.account like concat('%', #{account}, '%')
and sh.shop_name like concat('%', #{shop_name}, '%')
and exists (select manager_id from system_manager where manager_id=m.create_manager_id and manager_name like concat('%', #{search_manager_name}, '%') )
and m.create_manager_id=#{manager_id}
order by m.create_time desc
